Hi all, I'm using HubDB to generate dynamics pages. And in the dynamic_page_hubdb_row rendering, I would like to use the flexible column widget to have a custom content for each dynamics pages. When I'm editing my website page, I only have access to the row list display (dynamic_page_hubdb_table_id), and cannot edit the content of each generated pages (nothing happens when I click a link in the edition view). Is there a way to do that ?
I dont think so

Hey Jean-Pierre, Gobi is correct, there is no way to have a “page editor” for the dynamic page.

You may be able to using some conditional logic in your page to show the desired content to the users.
Is there a way to get HubDB dynamic pages to show up in Content dropdown so the pages can be linked to from other pages?

I resolved this by creating pages for each row and adding a slug column in the HubDB table that matches the slug of these pages, which share the same template.
So I can get the expected behavior.
Thanks !
